question: Match the following phrases with their correct NCERT-based meanings or functions:
column_B: A. Reason for floral characteristics like colour
B. We enjoy gazing at them
C. We swoon over them
D. Attract us visually
E. Contribute to plant reproduction
F. Flowers do not exist only for us
G. Show sexual reproduction
H. Seen in inflorescences and flowers
I. Ensure formation of reproductive end products
J. End products of sexual reproduction

word_count_covered.question: Match the following flower-related terms with their correct NCERT-based meanings or contexts:
column_B: A. Have had an intimate relationship with flowers
B. Used since time immemorial
C. Make homes and gardens beautiful
D. Used in ceremonies and traditions
E. Hold importance in cultural expressions
F. Convey love, affection, grief, mourning
G. Refers to cultivation and management of flowers
H. As viewed by a biologist
I. Reflect complex internal structure
J. Functional reproductive role in plants
